mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_coupons(customer_coupons_no, customer_coupons_enddate, customer_coupons_status, coupon_no, customer_no) VALUES(customer_coupons_customer_coupons_no_seq.nextval, sysdate+30, '사용가능', #{couponNo}, #{customerNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_coupons SET customer_coupons_status ='사용불가' WHERE customer_coupons_enddate < sysdate AND customer_coupons_status = '사용가능'
mapper.select: SELECT cc.customer_coupons_no, cc.customer_coupons_enddate, cc.customer_coupons_status, c.coupon_no, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_id, c.coupon_discount, c.coupon_desc FROM customer_coupons cc JOIN coupon c ON c.coupon_no = cc.coupon_no WHERE cc.customer_no = #{customerNo}
